rows.label: qst201812_msg0001
rows.name: Um, hello?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0002
rows.name: Hmph.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0003
rows.name:
...Um, I've got something for you...
Would you tell the others?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0004
rows.name: Bah.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0005
rows.name: Oh, you not like them?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0006
rows.name: Ah, you're a wary one, aren't you?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0007
rows.name:
Okay, so you don't want them?
I'm telling you, they're delicious...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0009
rows.name: Fine, I'll eat them if you don't want to...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0011
rows.name:
Wait, wait!
Don't eat them!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0012
rows.name:
Haha!
Now you feel like talking?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0013
rows.name: ...Mhm. It actually was tasty.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0014
rows.name:
But I ask myself, what ulterior motive
did you have to bring us such a gift?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0015
rows.name:
Well, about that.
I'm looking for a particular Phonex...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0016
rows.name:
...Looking for a Phonex?
Do you mean Pepe?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0017
rows.name: You know him?!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0018
rows.name:
Sure I do. It's not every day we get
visitors from abroad... Really, he's
a proper hero, so he is.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0019
rows.name: Can you tell me where he is now?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0020
rows.name: ...Unfortunately, he's gone.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0021
rows.name:
Gone?! You mean, like,
gone to another country still?!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0022
rows.name: Ah, no, not like that.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0023
rows.name:
He'd gathered a bunch of young folk
nearby and was talking to 'em
about something, when...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0024
rows.name:
all of a sudden, a Vacillus Antol
came and took 'em all captive!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0025
rows.name:
Say what now?!
Why didn't someone do something?!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0026
rows.name:
We wanted to, but we're talking about
a monstrous monster here.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0027
rows.name:
If Pepe, a real hero, couldn't do a thing,
then what hope do we have?

rows.label: qst201812_msg0028
rows.name: I bet they're all spider food by now...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0029
rows.name:
We'd probably best resign ourselves
to the inevitable.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0030
rows.name: I won't allow it!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0032
rows.name: You can't give in to despair!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0033
rows.name:
We might still make it in time!
We won't know till we try!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0034
rows.name:
Tell me where the Vacillus Antol
has its lair!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0035
rows.name:
It... It went off towards
the Ruined Chapel of Danafas...

rows.label: qst201812_msg0036
rows.name: That's probably where its nest is.

rows.label: qst201812_msg0037
rows.name: Got it!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0038
rows.name:
It'll be okay! I, Uka, will save everyone
and bring them to safety!

rows.label: qst201812_msg0039
rows.name:
Friends, lend me your strength!
The fight for Pepe's life begins now!
